Text: its watchable! better than other cam recordings. you see better lighting and u can se the writings. ofcourse not perfect, but if you reallly want to see 2012 I think its the best recording so far.
Everyone - this is the "best" so far.. if you are hooked on this movie this copy is a little better than other cams. you see more details. But prepare - DL may take a little longer though. but its ok
